jobs.name: Pipeline every minute
jobs.command: sudo -i -u ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git fetch origin $ENVIRONMENT --tags --force && git reset --hard FETCH_HEAD && git tag -l |xargs -I T bash -c 'if [[ $(git log -1 "T" --format=%ci) > $(git log -1 --format=%ci) ]]; then echo git tag -d  "T"; fi' && git tag | grep -vxFf <(git ls-remote --tags origin| awk '{print $2}'|sed 's|refs/tags/||')|xargs git tag -d && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sleep 10 && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch

jobs.name: Pipeline 08.00 every day
jobs.command: sudo -i -u ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git fetch origin $ENVIRONMENT --tags --force && git reset --hard FETCH_HEAD && git tag -l |xargs -I T bash -c 'if [[ $(git log -1 "T" --format=%ci) > $(git log -1 --format=%ci) ]]; then echo git tag -d  "T"; fi' && git tag | grep -vxFf <(git ls-remote --tags origin| awk '{print $2}'|sed 's|refs/tags/||')|xargs git tag -d && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sleep 10 && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch

jobs.name: Pipeline 16.00 every friday
jobs.command: sudo -i -u ubuntu cd $HOME/app_portfolio && git fetch origin $ENVIRONMENT --tags --force && git reset --hard FETCH_HEAD && git tag -l |xargs -I T bash -c 'if [[ $(git log -1 "T" --format=%ci) > $(git log -1 --format=%ci) ]]; then echo git tag -d  "T"; fi' && git tag | grep -vxFf <(git ls-remote --tags origin| awk '{print $2}'|sed 's|refs/tags/||')|xargs git tag -d && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio && sleep 10 && sudo systemctl restart app_portfolio_microservice_batch
